#id=1
#text=This morning when I woke up for work I realized I was running late for my usual ride .
#id=2
#text=I hurried to get ready and then raced to the bus terminal that is nearest to my apartment .
#id=3
#text=I arrived at the bus stop just in time as the bus was pulling up when I got there .
#id=4
#text=The bus driver opened the door and a line of people filed into the bus ahead of me .
#id=5
#text=As I boarded the bus I dropped some change in the drivers bucket to pay for my ride to work .
#id=6
#text=I quickly moved toward the back of the bus and found an open seat .
#id=7
#text=I sat patiently as the bus made a few more stops and people came and went from the bus .
#id=8
#text=After about twenty minutes the bus pulled up outside my office building .
#id=9
#text=The bus came to a stop and I hopped up and made my decent down the stairs and off the bus .
#text=I was at work with only minutes to spare before I needed to be punched in for my shift .
#text=I was happy I had made it on time .
